column2: (noun) loyalty and support for a ruler, country, group or belief
(noun) very large guns that are moved on wheels or metal tracks, or the part of the army that uses these
(noun) a big fight between armed forces
(noun) a system in which people or things are arranged according to their importance
working in the most active and difficult parts of a job or business
(verb) to organize or prepare something, such a group of people, or purpose // to prepare to fight, specially in a war
(noun) a position in an organziation, such as the army, showing the importance of the person having it
(noun) the relationship between two groups or amounts that expresses how much bigger on is than the other
(adjective) helping to achieve a plan, for example in business or politics
